meta.name: description
meta.content: Hurricane, WV is a top-rated community for all. Enjoy parks, events, and a thriving business scene. Explore our amenities and upcoming events!
Hurricane, WV is a top-rated community for all. Enjoy parks, events, and a thriving business scene. Explore our amenities and upcoming events!

div.h2: Hurricane is the perfect place to live, work, and play!

div.p:
Hurricane has achieved many recognitions like being named the Best Place to Raise a Family in West Virginia by Bloomberg Businessweek. It’s also home to a U.S. Top 50 Playground from Early Childhood Education Zone.
Hurricane is the perfect place for families to reside and travelers to visit!

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-box cff-shadow author-city-of-hurricane cff-1505249493115960 cff-new

p.span: NOTE: The Hurricane Municipal Building will close today (Friday, August 30th) at noon and will remain closed on Monday, September 2nd in observance of the Labor Day holiday.

img.alt: NOTE: The Hurricane Municipal Building will close today (Friday, August 30th) at noon and will remain closed on Monday, September 2nd in observance of the Labor Day holiday.
NOTE: The Hurricane Municipal Building will close today (Friday, August 30th) at noon and will remain closed on Monday, September 2nd in observance of the Labor Day holiday.

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-album cff-box cff-shadow author-city-of-hurricane cff-1505249493115960 cff-new

p.span:
We love seeing local businesses supporting each other! Consider eating on Main Street this weekend at Sergios Cucina Italiana & Steaks , Belknap Dough Company or Main Street Creamery & Grill ! There are also many other locally owned restaurants in Hurricane for you to check out.
#HurricaneWV #eatlocal #MeetMeOnMain

img.alt:

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-box cff-shadow author-city-of-hurricane cff-1505249493115960 cff-new

p.span: Reminder: Children First is set up in the parking lot of the City Municipal Building until 1:00 pm today with Chick-fil-A! If you didn't pre-order, they have some extra. You can pay with cash or PayPal. Meal is a chicken sandwich, waffle chips and a bottled water.

img.alt: Reminder: Children First is set up in the parking lot of the City Municipal Building until 1:00 pm today with Chick-fil-A! If you didnt pre-order, they have some extra. You can pay with cash or PayPal. Meal is a chicken sandwich, waffle chips and a bottled water.

Reminder: Children First is set up in the parking lot of the City Municipal Building until 1:00 pm today with Chick-fil-A! If you didnt pre-order, they have some extra. You can pay with cash or PayPal. Meal is a chicken sandwich, waffle chips and a bottled water.

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-box cff-shadow author-city-of-hurricane cff-1505249493115960 cff-new

p.span:
Need a dinner plan?
Or, how about some ice cream to cool off on this HOT day? Head down to Main Street Creamery & Grill !
#HurricaneWV #MeetMeOnMain #eatlocalWho wants to slave away in a hot kitchen when you can come here and get a delicious cheeseburger, fries and drink for $9.99?
You can upgrade to a milkshake for a small upcharged.
Come on, it's a no-brainer!

img.alt: Need a dinner plan? Or, how about some ice cream to cool off on this HOT day? Head down to Main Street Creamery & Grill ! #HurricaneWV #MeetMeOnMain #eatlocal
Need a dinner plan? Or, how about some ice cream to cool off on this HOT day? Head down to Main Street Creamery & Grill ! #HurricaneWV #MeetMeOnMain #eatlocal

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-city-of-hurricane cff-1505249493115960 cff-new

p.span:
This is happening TOMORROW (Thursday, August 29th) at lunchtime in the parking lot of the City Municipal Building.
Pre-order today by 3:00 pm using the phone number in the photo.
They will have some extra meals available for people who don't pre-order.
More details are below!

div.span: Send a message to learn more

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-box cff-shadow author-city-of-hurricane cff-1505249493115960 cff-new

p.span:
Heads up: Today is 2 for Tuesday at Belknap Dough Company! They open at 4:00 pm, so make your dinner plans now.
#HurricaneWV #eatlocal #MeetMeOnMainIts our favorite day of the week!!!
2725 Main Street
304-678-5531
delivery through Slice

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_21 et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: As Mayor of the City of Hurricane, welcome to one of the most progressive communities in the state with many amenities such as indoor/outdoor recreation, parks, retail shopping, entertainment, and a business climate that is second to none. The City of Hurricane was ranked the 2nd fastest-growing community for the past ten years according to the U.S. Census Bureau. The City continues to strive in providing its residents and businesses with top-notch services and infrastructure to succeed. Our path forward is not focused on today or tomorrow, but on how we can achieve our objectives and goals for the next 50 to 100 years. The City of Hurricane exemplifies great leadership, determination, and resourcefulness for a bright future.
